SELECT b.board_no, b.user_no, b.category_no, b.board_views, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_like_count, b.hashtag_content, b.register_datetime, b.register_id, b.board_delete_yn, SUM(IF(c.comment_delete_yn="N",1,0)) comment_count FROM Board_Detail b JOIN Comment_Detail c ON b.board_no = c.board_no WHERE category_no=#{category_no} AND board_delete_yn ='N' AND hashtag_content like CONCAT('%', #{hashtag}, '%') GROUP BY b.board_no ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT MIN(Board_no)-1 FROM Board_Detail WHERE category_no=#{category_no} AND #{last_board_no} >= board_no AND board_delete_yn = "N" AND hashtag_content like CONCAT('%', #{hashtag}, '%') ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(Board_no) FROM Board_Detail WHERE category_no=#{category_no} AND board_delete_yn = "N"

SELECT b.board_no, b.user_no, b.category_no, b.board_views, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_like_count, b.hashtag_content, b.register_datetime, b.register_id, b.board_delete_yn, SUM(IF(c.comment_delete_yn="N",1,0)) comment_count FROM Board_Detail b JOIN Comment_Detail c ON b.board_no = c.board_no WHERE category_no=#{category_no} AND hashtag_content like CONCAT('%', #{hashtag}, '%') AND board_delete_yn ='N' GROUP BY b.board_no ORDER BY board_like_count DESC, board_no DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT b.board_no, b.user_no, b.category_no, b.board_views, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_like_count, b.hashtag_content, b.register_datetime, b.register_id, b.board_delete_yn, SUM(IF(c.comment_delete_yn="N",1,0)) comment_count FROM Board_Detail b JOIN Comment_Detail c ON b.board_no = c.board_no WHERE board_like_count >= 10 AND board_delete_yn ='N' GROUP BY b.board_no ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT 50;
